rdf:Property.rdfs:label: est temporellement égale à
zeitgleich zu
συμπίπτει χρονικά με
равен по времени
is equal in time to
é temporalmente igual a
时段相同於
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This symmetric property allows the instances of E2 Temporal Entity with the same E52 Time-Span to be equated. This property is only necessary if the time span is unknown (otherwise the equivalence can be calculated). This property is the same as the "equal" relationship of Allen’s temporal logic (Allen, 1983, pp. 832-843).
